template.name: Survivor
template.parameter: double P_G, double P_P, double N_p, double N_m, double C_p, double C_m

location.name: H_G
location.label: Survivor has adopted a shared identity

location.name: H_P
location.label: Survivor has NOT adopted a shared identity

location.name: R_N_G
location.label: Robot instructs survivor to help the victim directly

location.name: R_C_P
location.label: Robot instructs survivor to contact a first-responder (e.g., a firefighter)

location.name: H_Np_G
location.label: _p locations: Survivor follows the robot's instruction

location.name: H_Cm_P
location.label: _m locations: Survivor ignores the robot's instruction
